attributes.action: Reduce student tuition fees due to the strikes.
attributes.additional_details: Because this impacts our learning and we are paying £9,250 for interruption in our education.
attributes.background: Cut part of the tuition fees because the strikes are impacting university education. University students should be able to claim the money pack for the cancelled lectures.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628976
